articles.title: It Missed Earth - But This Giant Asteroid Might Smash Into The Moon, NASA Warns
articles.description: NASA recently revealed that improved observations from the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) have sharpened the asteroid's projected path.
articles.content:
Once labelled as the asteroid with the highest-ever recorded impact risk to Earth, 2024 YR4 has resurfaced in scientific discussions, not due to threats to our planet, but because it now has a slightly higher chance of hitting the Moon in 2032.
NASA ... [2878 chars]

articles.description: A person has been hit by a train this morning.

articles.title: DICT wants internet service costs down by as much as 50%
articles.description: The Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT) is looking to bring down internet service provider (ISP) costs by as much as 50%, with the expected increase in competition and facility sharing.

articles.title: Did Pakistan actually vow nuke-for-nuke strike on Israel for Iran? Yes, says Tehran; Islamabad differs
articles.description: A top Iranian official has claimed that Pakistan would launch a nuclear strike on Israel if it used nuclear weapons against Iran—a claim swiftly denied by Islamabad. The remarks come amid soaring tensions, marked by missile exchanges and escalating rhetoric.
articles.content: A top Iranian official has claimed that Pakistan would launch a nuclear strike on Israel if it used nuclear weapons against Iran—a claim swiftly denied by Islamabad. The remarks come amid soaring tensions, marked by missile exchanges and escalating r... [2472 chars]

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 to launch on July 8 along OnePlus Buds 4 in India
articles.description: OnePlus on Monday formally announced the launch of OnePlus Nord 5 and OnePlus Nord CE 5 on July 8 at 2PM IST. The Chinese smartphone company will also launch the OnePlus Buds 4 along with Nord 5 series
articles.content:
OnePlus on Monday (June 16, 2025) formally announced the launch of OnePlus Nord 5 and OnePlus Nord CE 5 on July 8 at 2PM IST. The Chinese smartphone company will also launch the OnePlus Buds 4 along with Nord 5 series.
